comment: _type can be watch, practice or evaluate
title: Our first look at a component
displayTitle: Our first look at a component
body:
This component you're reading is a text component. All components take this form of a title and body - except a blank component. However it's important to realise that title and body attributes are not needed.

Take for instance the media component opposite or below on a smaller device - has no body attribute. Instead of the HTML being rendered Adapt simply doesn't render it. The title attribute is simply a break tag to push the media component level with the opposite component.
introduction:
This scenario is an example process to practice selecting hotspots and entering input data.

Select Start Practice to begin.

_items.warning: Select the hotspot (which would usually be invisible).
Enter the data as it appears on the datasheet.

_items.message: This is a message break to say something important about the process.

_items.warning: Select the hotspot (which would usually be invisible) to complete the scenario.

_items.message: You've seen an example of a scenario you can practice. Scroll down to see how you do on the evaluation version.
